name: Live Typing
tagline: Web & Mobile Apps Design, Development & Beyond
description:
An agile team of 50 people ready to help startups, nonprofits and enterprises to create, integrate and support modern software solutions. We achieve results in time and for appropriate prices, applying digital technologies for the best user experience. 
Our main services are
UX Analytics and UI prototype
Web and Mobile App Interface Design
Native iOS, Android and cross platform mobile app development
Web application and API development
We have offices in USA (Washington D.C.) and Russia (Moscow, Omsk).
